plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

TURNING MARKERS. (§ 11-2101)

When authorized signs, markers, buttons, or other indicators are placed within
an intersection indicating the course to be traveled by vehicles turning
thereat, no driver of a vehicle shall disobey the directions of the indicators. 
State law reference: Turning at intersections, G.S. 20-153.
